climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 100% Soft Double Brushed Microfiber/Thick Fiber Fill

COMPLETE BEDDING SOLUTION: Elevate your child's sleep space effortlessly with our Kid's Bed in a Bag Set. This all-inclusive package includes a comforter, fitted sheet, flat sheet, pillowcase, and sham – ensuring a coordinated and stylish look for their room.

VIBRANT DESIGNS: Inspire your child's imagination with our range of vibrant designs. From playful patterns to favorite characters, our bed in a bag sets offer options that perfectly suit your child's interests and room decor. The timeless designs include Dinosaurs, Space, Trucks, Rainbow Unicorn, Waterbury Marble, Fairytale Princess, Football, Galaxy, Monster Truck, Safari, and Unicorn Forever

QUALITY MATERIALS: Crafted from high-quality materials, our bed in a bag sets guarantee comfort and durability. The softness of the sheets and the coziness of the comforter ensure a restful night's sleep for your little one.

CONVENIENCE IN CARE: Enjoy the convenience of easy maintenance. All components of our bed in a bag sets are machine washable, allowing for quick and hassle-free cleaning, so your child's sleep environment remains fresh and inviting.

HOW WE SIZE UP - This kids bedding set comes in two sizes, Twin and Full size. Twin dimensions are as follows: Comforter: 68" x 88", Fitted Sheet: 39" x 75", Flat Sheet: 66" x 96", 1 Pillowcase: 20" x 30", 1 Pillow Sham: 20" x 26" (note: Twin Size only includes 1 pillowcases and 1 pillow sham)
body.description: Introducing the Sweet Home Collection Kids Bed in a Bag Set – your child's gateway to an enchanting sleep space that combines comfort, style, and convenience. This comprehensive set offers everything needed to create a cohesive and inviting sleep environment for your little one.Revitalize their room with our vibrant designs that cater to diverse tastes. From whimsical patterns to beloved characters, our bed in a bag sets add a touch of playful charm to their sanctuary. Spark their imagination and create a space that reflects their unique personality.Crafted from top-quality materials, our bed in a bag sets ensure your child's utmost comfort and satisfaction. The softness of the sheets and the coziness of the comforter promise a night of restful sleep, enveloping them in a soothing embrace.Cleaning is a breeze with our machine-washable components. From the comforter to the pillowcase, maintaining a fresh sleep environment is as simple as a spin in the washing machine. Say goodbye to the hassles of complicated care instructions.Versatility is at the heart of our bed in a bag sets. Whether it's for sleepovers, room transformations, or a cozy upgrade, these sets adapt to various needs and bed sizes. Ensure your child's sleep space evolves alongside them, accommodating their changing preferences and requirements.Invest in your child's well-being and comfort with the Kid's Bed in a Bag Set. Experience the convenience of an all-inclusive bedding solution that adds a burst of color and joy to their room while ensuring they enjoy a cozy night's sleep every night.Dimensions are as follows:Twin size: Comforter: 68" x 88", Fitted Sheet: 39" x 75", Flat Sheet: 66" x 96", 1 Pillowcase: 20" x 30", 1 Pillow Sham: 20" x 26" (note: Twin Size only includes 1 pillowcases and 1 pillow sham)Full size: Comforter: 78" x 88", Fitted Sheet: 54" x 75", Flat Sheet: 81" x 96", 2 Pillowcases: 20" x 30" Each, 2 Pillow Shams: 20" x 26" Each

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us Our mission is simple: to help you create the bedroom and bathroom of your dreams with the high quality bed and bath accessories. That was our focus when we opened our family-owned business in 1995, and it remains our top priority today. Our unwavering commitment to quality starts at the very beginning, when our products are made. Since we manufacture nearly everything we sell, we’re able to insist on using only the best designs and materials. And since we’ve cut out the middle man, we can accommodate retail and wholesale customers, domestic and international orders -- all while keeping prices reasonable. Our unmatched selection also sets us apart from others. Whether you’re shopping for luxury bedding and alternative down comforters or designer shower curtains and bath rugs, we’ve got you covered. Our large inventory is constantly growing, so we have something to fit every sense of style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality nice and soft. Loved the soft pink color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Surprisly good quality! Really nice bed set! Soft thick comfy comforter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, soft. Valuable!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing price. Got an entire set sheets blanket and everything! Soft, warm and beautifully made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great set!
reviews.reviewText: This comforter set is fluffy and really cute. The ruffles are pretty, and it’s a nice quality too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was very hesitant to purchase the comforter because of the reviews but my order was great. All 7 pieces arrrived. The comforter had no stains. The color is blush pink or baby pink. I was afraid of it being a dark pepto color. I would definitely recommend these covers. My daughters loved them. The full size was accurate but if you want them to hang more definitely get a bigger size.The picture was taken at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bed spread
reviews.reviewText: This set is amazing. Love the texture of the blanket. This blanket stays nice and cool throughout the night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nicely made
reviews.reviewText: I’m thrilled with this comforter and sheet set. I actually used it on a cot. My granddaughter was visiting for Christmas and slept on the cot. She’s 4 years old. She was so happy when she saw her bed. The comforter is soft and pretty with the unicorns. I would definitely recommend this bedding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great in my toddlers room. I've had to wash comforter since purchase and it held up great. Very pleased.
Nunca había comprado ropa de cama de esta marca y la verdad me sorprendió gratamente. El edredón es grueso pero no pesado, todo el conjunto es de excelente calidad.
Excelente calidad del producto, muy bonito diseño y quedó justo, lo recomiendo.
I love this comfortor! It was a really good quality. Nice and soft and fluffy. It looked just like in the picture. It came with the sheets, comforter, pillow cases and shams.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bellas, color tela y su dibujo
reviews.reviewText: Compre dos bellas el color bello igual a la publicación es para mis nietas y es un rosa maravilloso todavía no se lavan.Empaque muy bien comprimida y doble bolsa además dentro de una caja 📦 si volvería comprar

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful bedding for a little girl!
reviews.reviewText: This bedding set is so beautiful and such nice quality. It looks expensive but a very good value with sheets included for the price. Would recommend!
